AsyncLogHandler - Class in com.ca.alog
Enqueues log records which are then processed by separate thread.

C

close() - Method in class com.ca.alog.AsyncLogHandler
Closes the PrintStream, terminates the write thread and performs houseKeeping.
com.ca.alog - package com.ca.alog
Async log handler for Java Util Logging.

D

DEFAULT_BACKUP_THRESHOLD - Static variable in class com.ca.alog.Alog
This is the threshold, not a hard limit: 10 megs by default.
DEFAULT_MAX_BACKUPS - Static variable in class com.ca.alog.Alog
The default number of backups to retain: 10 by default.
DEFAULT_MAX_QUEUE - Static variable in class com.ca.alog.Alog
Max async queue size: 500K by default.

R
